StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetOssByRsID]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@RsID int AS
SELECT RO.ORGANIZATION_ID, RO.SHORT_NAME, RO.ORGANIZATION_TYPE, RO.ISOPEN, RO.EFFECTIVE_DATE FROM RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION RO WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN ORGANIZATION_MAP OM ON RO.ORGANIZATION_ID = OM.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = @RsID AND ORGANIZATION_TYPE = 'OSS' AND ISOPEN='Y' ORDER BY ISOPEN DESC, SHORT_NAME
